title: Best of The Program | Guests: Rep. Thomas Massie & Jade Powell | 3/18/20
description:
Coronavirus update: The virus is now in all 50 states, it may cause permanent lung damage, and masks DO work. Rep. Thomas Massie argues that the coronavirus’ greatest harm to society will be how much government infringement we may allow. The Trump administration suggests giving monthly checks to the American people. But while extra money may help, the government shouldn’t GIVE it; it should stop TAKING it! “Shopping Angels” founder Jayde Powell is making a difference through a simple act of kindness: organizing a nationwide team to shop for the elderly and those who can’t during the pandemic!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: While extra money may help right now, the government shouldn’t GIVE it to us; it should stop TAKING it!
